content.text:
{"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":262192,"originalJapaneseLine":"確認(\"自由都市ピンチ\")==1","translatedEnglishLine":"Check (\"Free City in Danger\") == 1"},{"lineNumber":262193,"originalJapaneseLine":"　地図　自由都市１／合戦３１　を使って戦況説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Use map Free City 1 / Battle 31 to explain the battle situation."},{"lineNumber":262194,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍の方が圧倒的に多く滅亡の可能性がある状態","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army is overwhelmingly larger, and there's a possibility of annihilation."},{"lineNumber":262195,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス達がこの方面に来た魔人を殲滅してくれはしたが、魔物大将軍ピサロ率いる","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance and his group annihilated the demon beings arriving in this area, but the demon general Pissaro leads..."},{"lineNumber":262196,"originalJapaneseLine":"　S(Ｔ敵軍兵力());万にも及ぶ大軍は自由都市連合軍を徐々に追い詰めていた","translatedEnglishLine":"An army of tens of thousands, S(T enemy forces), was gradually cornering the Free City allied forces."},{"lineNumber":262197,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔軍は自由都市地帯を突破してＪＡＰＡＮへ迫ろうとしていた","translatedEnglishLine":"The demon army was breaking through the Free City area and advancing toward JAPAN."},{"lineNumber":262198,"originalJapaneseLine":"　コパンドンと都市長達の会話、セシル隊長などの出番","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation between Copandon and the city mayors, with Captain Cecil's appearance."},{"lineNumber":262199,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今がふんばり所やで、あきらめたらそれで試合終了や、まだ逆転のチャンスはある","translatedEnglishLine":"Now’s the time to hold on; if you give up, the game is over. There’s still a chance to turn things around."},{"lineNumber":262200,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とコパンドンがみんなを奮起","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon motivates everyone like this."},{"lineNumber":262201,"originalJapaneseLine":"　","translatedEnglishLine":""},{"lineNumber":262202,"originalJapaneseLine":"確認(\"自由都市ピンチ\")==0","translatedEnglishLine":"Check (\"Free City in Danger\") == 0"},{"lineNumber":262203,"originalJapaneseLine":"　地図　自由都市１／合戦３２　を使って戦況説明","translatedEnglishLine":"Use map Free City 1 / Battle 32 to explain the battle situation."},{"lineNumber":262204,"originalJapaneseLine":"　戦力的には均衡している、どちらかという少し押している","translatedEnglishLine":"The forces are balanced, though slightly leaning toward one side."},{"lineNumber":262205,"originalJapaneseLine":"　セシルの指揮する部隊が大勝利をして帰還してきた所","translatedEnglishLine":"The unit under Cecil's command has returned after a great victory."},{"lineNumber":262206,"originalJapaneseLine":"　都市長達が褒め称える、さすがですとちやほや","translatedEnglishLine":"City mayors praise them, lavishly flattering with 'As expected'."},{"lineNumber":262207,"originalJapaneseLine":"　２日前の合戦でハンナ南部の敵軍をおおかた撃破してきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Two days ago's battle mostly defeated the enemy forces in southern Hanna."},{"lineNumber":262208,"originalJapaneseLine":"　次はアイス方面に立て籠もる大将軍ピサロを含む敵主力ですね","translatedEnglishLine":"Next is the enemy main force including General Pissaro entrenched in the Ice direction."},{"lineNumber":262209,"originalJapaneseLine":"　すぐにでもとセシルに迫る都市長だが","translatedEnglishLine":"The city mayor urges Cecil to act immediately, but..."},{"lineNumber":262210,"originalJapaneseLine":"　そんな簡単には勝てない・","translatedEnglishLine":"It won’t be that easy to win."},{"lineNumber":262211,"originalJapaneseLine":"　コパンドン、こないだ連絡があったＪＡＰＡＮからの大規模援軍が来まで","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon says, until the large reinforcements from JAPAN, which were recently contacted, arrive..."},{"lineNumber":262212,"originalJapaneseLine":"　待ちましょうとかうんぬん","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's wait and so on."},{"lineNumber":262213,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔軍司令部、アイスの町","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Army Headquarters, town of Ice."},{"lineNumber":262214,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物大将軍ピサロ、その配下の魔物将軍達","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon General Pissaro and his subordinate demon generals."},{"lineNumber":262215,"originalJapaneseLine":"宝石いっぱいで喜んでいるピサロ、急ぐ必要はない増援を待て","translatedEnglishLine":"Pissaro, pleased with lots of jewels, says there’s no need to rush; wait for reinforcements."},{"lineNumber":262216,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔人パイアール、魔人レイを失ったが、我らの優位は変わらない","translatedEnglishLine":"Though we lost demon beings Paiar and Rei, our advantage remains unchanged."},{"lineNumber":262217,"originalJapaneseLine":"無理をする必要はゆっくりと押し込んで人間共を追いつめていけばよい","translatedEnglishLine":"No need to force it; we should slowly push forward and corner the humans."},{"lineNumber":262218,"originalJapaneseLine":"後、何かピサロが金銀財宝に執着しているシチュエーションを一つ","translatedEnglishLine":"Also, a situation showing Pissaro’s obsession with gold and silver treasures."},{"lineNumber":262219,"originalJapaneseLine":"これは、自由都市司令部にもピサロ金銀に執着すごいなぁと伝わるような内用","translatedEnglishLine":"This content conveys to the Free City command how obsessed Pissaro is with gold and silver."},{"lineNumber":262220,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市方面、人類側司令部、Ｍランド","translatedEnglishLine":"Free City front, human command headquarters, M Land."},{"lineNumber":262221,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスが現れた、やほー","translatedEnglishLine":"Lance appears, \"Yaho!\""},

{"lineNumber":262222,"originalJapaneseLine":"コパンドン、セシル、各都市長などと会話（ビョンホウはややこしいから出さないでおいて下さい）","translatedEnglishLine":"Conversation with Copandon, Cecil, and the city mayors (Please do not include Byonhou as it’s complicated)."},{"lineNumber":262223,"originalJapaneseLine":"ここは戦況報告というより、普通の会話で・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Here, it’s more of a normal conversation than a battle report..."},{"lineNumber":262224,"originalJapaneseLine":"俺が来たからには安心だ、明日から本格的に行動開始するぞ。今日は歓迎会をしろー","translatedEnglishLine":"Now that I’m here, you can relax. We’ll start full actions from tomorrow. Hold a welcome party today!"},{"lineNumber":262225,"originalJapaneseLine":"夜、廊下・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Night, hallway..."},{"lineNumber":262226,"originalJapaneseLine":"ご機嫌のランス、あの子はジオの秘書官だったか、名前は覚えてないが、いい体付きだった。満足","translatedEnglishLine":"Cheerful Lance: That girl was Geo’s secretary, I don’t remember her name, but she had a nice body. Satisfied."},{"lineNumber":262227,"originalJapaneseLine":"とやった後の廊下に出て涼んでいる様子","translatedEnglishLine":"After that, he goes out to the hallway to cool off."},{"lineNumber":262228,"originalJapaneseLine":"まだ時間あるな、誰かの部屋に夜這いにいこう・・・","translatedEnglishLine":"Still have time. Let’s sneak into someone’s room at night..."},{"lineNumber":262229,"originalJapaneseLine":"この辺はカスタム関係者か・・マリアのしよう。マリアの部屋はと・・ここか","translatedEnglishLine":"Around here are custom personnel... Let's go to Maria's room. Maria's room is... here."},{"lineNumber":262230,"originalJapaneseLine":"その時、ドアが開き　中からダークランスが出てきた。","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, the door opened and Dark Lance came out."},{"lineNumber":262231,"originalJapaneseLine":"ダークランスはランスを見ると少し複雑な表情をしてそのまま立ち去った","translatedEnglishLine":"Dark Lance looked at Lance with a slightly complicated expression and then left."},{"lineNumber":262232,"originalJapaneseLine":"・・・おい、マリア、どういう事だ。","translatedEnglishLine":"...Hey, Maria, what’s going on?"},{"lineNumber":262233,"originalJapaneseLine":"マリアが出てくる、なんの罪悪感もない感じ、あっランス、どうしたの？","translatedEnglishLine":"Maria comes out, seeming with no guilt. \"Oh Lance, what’s wrong?\""},{"lineNumber":262234,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうしたのではない、夜這いか、あいつが夜這いなのか・・","translatedEnglishLine":"It’s not 'what’s wrong', it’s a night raid? Was that guy sneaking into your room?"},{"lineNumber":262235,"originalJapaneseLine":"えっ、違うわよ・・ダークランスとは最近知り合って、よく相談を受けるの","translatedEnglishLine":"Eh, no... I recently got to know Dark Lance and often get advice from him."},{"lineNumber":262236,"originalJapaneseLine":"なんの相談だ","translatedEnglishLine":"What kind of advice?"},{"lineNumber":262237,"originalJapaneseLine":"うーん、それは内緒。お父さんには知られたくない事も男の子は持っているのよ","translatedEnglishLine":"Hmm, that’s a secret. Boys have things they don’t want their dads to know."},{"lineNumber":262238,"originalJapaneseLine":"えーい、吐かせてやるとマリアを押し倒す","translatedEnglishLine":"Come on, I'll make you tell me! He pushes Maria down."},{"lineNumber":262239,"originalJapaneseLine":"翌朝、司令部","translatedEnglishLine":"The next morning, command headquarters."},{"lineNumber":262240,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦況報告、地図を出す場合は　／戦況に合わせて　２種類","translatedEnglishLine":"Battle report: if showing a map, prepare two types according to the situation."},{"lineNumber":262241,"originalJapaneseLine":"敵の総大将は魔物大将軍ピサロ、だがあまり前線に出てこない、こいつさえ倒せば魔軍は総崩れになり","translatedEnglishLine":"The enemy’s supreme general is the demon general Pissaro, but he rarely appears on the front lines. If we defeat him, the demon army will collapse."},{"lineNumber":262242,"originalJapaneseLine":"自由都市地帯は一気に取り戻せるのだが","translatedEnglishLine":"We can quickly reclaim the Free City area."},{"lineNumber":262243,"originalJapaneseLine":"用心深いのか・・ま、当然だな。どんな奴なのだ","translatedEnglishLine":"Is he cautious? Well, naturally. What kind of guy is he?"},{"lineNumber":262244,"originalJapaneseLine":"　これまでの情報を集めると","translatedEnglishLine":"Gathering all the information so far,"},{"lineNumber":262245,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ピサロはあまり前線に出てこない","translatedEnglishLine":"Pissaro rarely comes to the front lines."},{"lineNumber":262246,"originalJapaneseLine":"　金銀財宝が好きらしい、各地の町から集めまくっている","translatedEnglishLine":"He seems to like gold and silver treasures and is gathering them from towns everywhere."},{"lineNumber":262247,"originalJapaneseLine":"　特別な財宝については自ら奪いにいっているらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"For special treasures, he apparently goes himself to seize them."},{"lineNumber":262248,"originalJapaneseLine":"金銀が好きなのか、理解出来ないな・・女みたいな奴だ","translatedEnglishLine":"He likes gold and silver? I don't understand... he’s like a woman."},{"lineNumber":262249,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスだったら美女集めまくっているわね・・","translatedEnglishLine":"If it were Lance, he'd be gathering lots of beautiful women..."},{"lineNumber":262250,"originalJapaneseLine":"だが、となると簡単な事ではないか、奴がほしがりそうな金品を囮にしておびき出して殺せば一発だ","translatedEnglishLine":"But that makes it simple: use the valuables he’s likely to want as bait to lure him out and kill him in one go."},{"lineNumber":262251,"originalJapaneseLine":"おい、お前らそういう品はないのか","translatedEnglishLine":"Hey, don’t you guys have such items?"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確認("自由都市ピンチ")==1
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Check ("Free City in Danger") == 1

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図　自由都市１／合戦３１　を使って戦況説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Use map Free City 1 / Battle 31 to explain the battle situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の方が圧倒的に多く滅亡の可能性がある状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army is overwhelmingly larger, and there's a possibility of annihilation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がこの方面に来た魔人を殲滅してくれはしたが、魔物大将軍ピサロ率いる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his group annihilated the demon beings arriving in this area, but the demon general Pissaro leads...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: S(Ｔ敵軍兵力());万にも及ぶ大軍は自由都市連合軍を徐々に追い詰めていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An army of tens of thousands, S(T enemy forces), was gradually cornering the Free City allied forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は自由都市地帯を突破してＪＡＰＡＮへ迫ろうとしていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army was breaking through the Free City area and advancing toward JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンと都市長達の会話、セシル隊長などの出番
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Copandon and the city mayors, with Captain Cecil's appearance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今がふんばり所やで、あきらめたらそれで試合終了や、まだ逆転のチャンスはある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now’s the time to hold on; if you give up, the game is over. There’s still a chance to turn things around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とコパンドンがみんなを奮起
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon motivates everyone like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確認("自由都市ピンチ")==0
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Check ("Free City in Danger") == 0

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図　自由都市１／合戦３２　を使って戦況説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Use map Free City 1 / Battle 32 to explain the battle situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦力的には均衡している、どちらかという少し押している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The forces are balanced, though slightly leaning toward one side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルの指揮する部隊が大勝利をして帰還してきた所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The unit under Cecil's command has returned after a great victory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市長達が褒め称える、さすがですとちやほや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: City mayors praise them, lavishly flattering with 'As expected'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２日前の合戦でハンナ南部の敵軍をおおかた撃破してきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two days ago's battle mostly defeated the enemy forces in southern Hanna.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次はアイス方面に立て籠もる大将軍ピサロを含む敵主力ですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next is the enemy main force including General Pissaro entrenched in the Ice direction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐにでもとセシルに迫る都市長だが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The city mayor urges Cecil to act immediately, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな簡単には勝てない・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won’t be that easy to win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドン、こないだ連絡があったＪＡＰＡＮからの大規模援軍が来まで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon says, until the large reinforcements from JAPAN, which were recently contacted, arrive...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待ちましょうとかうんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's wait and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍司令部、アイスの町
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army Headquarters, town of Ice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ピサロ、その配下の魔物将軍達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon General Pissaro and his subordinate demon generals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝石いっぱいで喜んでいるピサロ、急ぐ必要はない増援を待て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pissaro, pleased with lots of jewels, says there’s no need to rush; wait for reinforcements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人パイアール、魔人レイを失ったが、我らの優位は変わらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though we lost demon beings Paiar and Rei, our advantage remains unchanged.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理をする必要はゆっくりと押し込んで人間共を追いつめていけばよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to force it; we should slowly push forward and corner the humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後、何かピサロが金銀財宝に執着しているシチュエーションを一つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, a situation showing Pissaro’s obsession with gold and silver treasures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは、自由都市司令部にもピサロ金銀に執着すごいなぁと伝わるような内用
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This content conveys to the Free City command how obsessed Pissaro is with gold and silver.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市方面、人類側司令部、Ｍランド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Free City front, human command headquarters, M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが現れた、やほー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance appears, "Yaho!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドン、セシル、各都市長などと会話（ビョンホウはややこしいから出さないでおいて下さい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with Copandon, Cecil, and the city mayors (Please do not include Byonhou as it’s complicated).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは戦況報告というより、普通の会話で・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, it’s more of a normal conversation than a battle report...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が来たからには安心だ、明日から本格的に行動開始するぞ。今日は歓迎会をしろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now that I’m here, you can relax. We’ll start full actions from tomorrow. Hold a welcome party today!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜、廊下・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Night, hallway...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご機嫌のランス、あの子はジオの秘書官だったか、名前は覚えてないが、いい体付きだった。満足
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cheerful Lance: That girl was Geo’s secretary, I don’t remember her name, but she had a nice body. Satisfied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とやった後の廊下に出て涼んでいる様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, he goes out to the hallway to cool off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ時間あるな、誰かの部屋に夜這いにいこう・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still have time. Let’s sneak into someone’s room at night...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この辺はカスタム関係者か・・マリアのしよう。マリアの部屋はと・・ここか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around here are custom personnel... Let's go to Maria's room. Maria's room is... here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、ドアが開き　中からダークランスが出てきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, the door opened and Dark Lance came out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスはランスを見ると少し複雑な表情をしてそのまま立ち去った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance looked at Lance with a slightly complicated expression and then left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・おい、マリア、どういう事だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hey, Maria, what’s going on?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアが出てくる、なんの罪悪感もない感じ、あっランス、どうしたの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria comes out, seeming with no guilt. "Oh Lance, what’s wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしたのではない、夜這いか、あいつが夜這いなのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s not 'what’s wrong', it’s a night raid? Was that guy sneaking into your room?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、違うわよ・・ダークランスとは最近知り合って、よく相談を受けるの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh, no... I recently got to know Dark Lance and often get advice from him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんの相談だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of advice?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、それは内緒。お父さんには知られたくない事も男の子は持っているのよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, that’s a secret. Boys have things they don’t want their dads to know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、吐かせてやるとマリアを押し倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, I'll make you tell me! He pushes Maria down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌朝、司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next morning, command headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況報告、地図を出す場合は　／戦況に合わせて　２種類
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle report: if showing a map, prepare two types according to the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵の総大将は魔物大将軍ピサロ、だがあまり前線に出てこない、こいつさえ倒せば魔軍は総崩れになり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy’s supreme general is the demon general Pissaro, but he rarely appears on the front lines. If we defeat him, the demon army will collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市地帯は一気に取り戻せるのだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can quickly reclaim the Free City area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 用心深いのか・・ま、当然だな。どんな奴なのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is he cautious? Well, naturally. What kind of guy is he?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまでの情報を集めると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gathering all the information so far,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロはあまり前線に出てこない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pissaro rarely comes to the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金銀財宝が好きらしい、各地の町から集めまくっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seems to like gold and silver treasures and is gathering them from towns everywhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特別な財宝については自ら奪いにいっているらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For special treasures, he apparently goes himself to seize them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金銀が好きなのか、理解出来ないな・・女みたいな奴だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He likes gold and silver? I don't understand... he’s like a woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスだったら美女集めまくっているわね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it were Lance, he'd be gathering lots of beautiful women...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、となると簡単な事ではないか、奴がほしがりそうな金品を囮にしておびき出して殺せば一発だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that makes it simple: use the valuables he’s likely to want as bait to lure him out and kill him in one go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、お前らそういう品はないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, don’t you guys have such items?

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text:

There’s still a chance to turn things around."},{"lineNumber":262200,"originalJapaneseLine":"　とコパンドンがみんなを奮起","translatedEnglishLine":"Copandon motivates everyone like translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確認("自由都市ピンチ")==1
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Check ("Free City in Danger") == 1

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図　自由都市１／合戦３１　を使って戦況説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Use map Free City 1 / Battle 31 to explain the battle situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の方が圧倒的に多く滅亡の可能性がある状態
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army is overwhelmingly larger, and there's a possibility of annihilation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス達がこの方面に来た魔人を殲滅してくれはしたが、魔物大将軍ピサロ率いる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance and his group annihilated the demon beings arriving in this area, but the demon general Pissaro leads...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: S(Ｔ敵軍兵力());万にも及ぶ大軍は自由都市連合軍を徐々に追い詰めていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: An army of tens of thousands, S(T enemy forces), was gradually cornering the Free City allied forces.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍は自由都市地帯を突破してＪＡＰＡＮへ迫ろうとしていた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The demon army was breaking through the Free City area and advancing toward JAPAN.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンと都市長達の会話、セシル隊長などの出番
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation between Copandon and the city mayors, with Captain Cecil's appearance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今がふんばり所やで、あきらめたらそれで試合終了や、まだ逆転のチャンスはある
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now’s the time to hold on; if you give up, the game is over. There’s still a chance to turn things around.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とコパンドンがみんなを奮起
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon motivates everyone like this.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 確認("自由都市ピンチ")==0
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Check ("Free City in Danger") == 0

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 地図　自由都市１／合戦３２　を使って戦況説明
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Use map Free City 1 / Battle 32 to explain the battle situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦力的には均衡している、どちらかという少し押している
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The forces are balanced, though slightly leaning toward one side.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: セシルの指揮する部隊が大勝利をして帰還してきた所
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The unit under Cecil's command has returned after a great victory.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 都市長達が褒め称える、さすがですとちやほや
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: City mayors praise them, lavishly flattering with 'As expected'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ２日前の合戦でハンナ南部の敵軍をおおかた撃破してきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Two days ago's battle mostly defeated the enemy forces in southern Hanna.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 次はアイス方面に立て籠もる大将軍ピサロを含む敵主力ですね
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Next is the enemy main force including General Pissaro entrenched in the Ice direction.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: すぐにでもとセシルに迫る都市長だが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The city mayor urges Cecil to act immediately, but...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんな簡単には勝てない・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It won’t be that easy to win.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドン、こないだ連絡があったＪＡＰＡＮからの大規模援軍が来まで
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Copandon says, until the large reinforcements from JAPAN, which were recently contacted, arrive...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 待ちましょうとかうんぬん
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's wait and so on.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍司令部、アイスの町
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Army Headquarters, town of Ice.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物大将軍ピサロ、その配下の魔物将軍達
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon General Pissaro and his subordinate demon generals.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 宝石いっぱいで喜んでいるピサロ、急ぐ必要はない増援を待て
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pissaro, pleased with lots of jewels, says there’s no need to rush; wait for reinforcements.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人パイアール、魔人レイを失ったが、我らの優位は変わらない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though we lost demon beings Paiar and Rei, our advantage remains unchanged.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 無理をする必要はゆっくりと押し込んで人間共を追いつめていけばよい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No need to force it; we should slowly push forward and corner the humans.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 後、何かピサロが金銀財宝に執着しているシチュエーションを一つ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Also, a situation showing Pissaro’s obsession with gold and silver treasures.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これは、自由都市司令部にもピサロ金銀に執着すごいなぁと伝わるような内用
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This content conveys to the Free City command how obsessed Pissaro is with gold and silver.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市方面、人類側司令部、Ｍランド
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Free City front, human command headquarters, M Land.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスが現れた、やほー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Lance appears, "Yaho!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドン、セシル、各都市長などと会話（ビョンホウはややこしいから出さないでおいて下さい）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Conversation with Copandon, Cecil, and the city mayors (Please do not include Byonhou as it’s complicated).

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここは戦況報告というより、普通の会話で・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Here, it’s more of a normal conversation than a battle report...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺が来たからには安心だ、明日から本格的に行動開始するぞ。今日は歓迎会をしろー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now that I’m here, you can relax. We’ll start full actions from tomorrow. Hold a welcome party today!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 夜、廊下・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Night, hallway...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ご機嫌のランス、あの子はジオの秘書官だったか、名前は覚えてないが、いい体付きだった。満足
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cheerful Lance: That girl was Geo’s secretary, I don’t remember her name, but she had a nice body. Satisfied.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: とやった後の廊下に出て涼んでいる様子
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After that, he goes out to the hallway to cool off.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ時間あるな、誰かの部屋に夜這いにいこう・・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Still have time. Let’s sneak into someone’s room at night...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この辺はカスタム関係者か・・マリアのしよう。マリアの部屋はと・・ここか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Around here are custom personnel... Let's go to Maria's room. Maria's room is... here.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その時、ドアが開き　中からダークランスが出てきた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, the door opened and Dark Lance came out.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ダークランスはランスを見ると少し複雑な表情をしてそのまま立ち去った
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Dark Lance looked at Lance with a slightly complicated expression and then left.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・おい、マリア、どういう事だ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Hey, Maria, what’s going on?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: マリアが出てくる、なんの罪悪感もない感じ、あっランス、どうしたの？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maria comes out, seeming with no guilt. "Oh Lance, what’s wrong?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうしたのではない、夜這いか、あいつが夜這いなのか・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It’s not 'what’s wrong', it’s a night raid? Was that guy sneaking into your room?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えっ、違うわよ・・ダークランスとは最近知り合って、よく相談を受けるの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Eh, no... I recently got to know Dark Lance and often get advice from him.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なんの相談だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What kind of advice?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: うーん、それは内緒。お父さんには知られたくない事も男の子は持っているのよ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmm, that’s a secret. Boys have things they don’t want their dads to know.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: えーい、吐かせてやるとマリアを押し倒す
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Come on, I'll make you tell me! He pushes Maria down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 翌朝、司令部
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The next morning, command headquarters.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦況報告、地図を出す場合は　／戦況に合わせて　２種類
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Battle report: if showing a map, prepare two types according to the situation.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 敵の総大将は魔物大将軍ピサロ、だがあまり前線に出てこない、こいつさえ倒せば魔軍は総崩れになり
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The enemy’s supreme general is the demon general Pissaro, but he rarely appears on the front lines. If we defeat him, the demon army will collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 自由都市地帯は一気に取り戻せるのだが
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We can quickly reclaim the Free City area.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 用心深いのか・・ま、当然だな。どんな奴なのだ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is he cautious? Well, naturally. What kind of guy is he?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: これまでの情報を集めると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Gathering all the information so far,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ピサロはあまり前線に出てこない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Pissaro rarely comes to the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金銀財宝が好きらしい、各地の町から集めまくっている
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He seems to like gold and silver treasures and is gathering them from towns everywhere.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 特別な財宝については自ら奪いにいっているらしい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: For special treasures, he apparently goes himself to seize them.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 金銀が好きなのか、理解出来ないな・・女みたいな奴だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He likes gold and silver? I don't understand... he’s like a woman.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスだったら美女集めまくっているわね・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If it were Lance, he'd be gathering lots of beautiful women...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、となると簡単な事ではないか、奴がほしがりそうな金品を囮にしておびき出して殺せば一発だ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But that makes it simple: use the valuables he’s likely to want as bait to lure him out and kill him in one go.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: おい、お前らそういう品はないのか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hey, don’t you guys have such items?
